sentences.en: Building type experience in: Residential, Commercial Mix - Use , Retail, Education and Healthcare, preferred.
sentences.cn: 具备住宅 、 商业、 多用途 、 零售 、 教育与医疗服务等类型建筑经验者优先.

sentences.en: For topical treatment and healthcare with radiant heat of the ray.
sentences.cn: 供医疗单位利用红外线幅射热作局部治疗、保健用.

sentences.en: Health informatics -- Patient healthcare data -- Part 2: Common objects.
sentences.cn: 卫生信息 — 病人健康卡数据 -- 第2部分 — 一般目标.

sentences.en: Healthcare and biotech attracted 12 per cent and consulting 11 per cent.
sentences.cn: 保健和生物技术行业吸引了12%的学生,咨询行业为11%.

sentences.en: Healthcare and utilities, more defensive, are up only about 11 per cent.
sentences.cn: 防御性较强的医疗和公用事业类股只上涨了大约11%.

sentences.en: Healthcare information system is an important branch of medical informatics.
sentences.cn: 医疗信息系统是医学信息学(MedicalInformatics)研究的重要分支.

sentences.en: In healthcare, the cash nexus undermines the doctor - patient relationship.
sentences.cn: 在医疗行业, 金钱有可能扭曲医务人员与患者之间应有的关系.

sentences.en: Its healthcare benefits are extremely good and it has no side effects.
sentences.cn: 是目前为止所发现的世上最原始的、最好的天然滋补品,医疗保健效果极佳且无副作用.

sentences.en: Openness : Being open, honest, and trustworthy is vital in healthcare.
sentences.cn: 公开性: 公开, 诚实和可信在医疗保健中至关重要.

sentences.en: Product Information : Furniture Accessories Mail Order Products, Personal Care of Home Healthcare.
sentences.cn: 企业简介:主营产品: 主要经营家具附件, 个人家庭保健产品.

sentences.en: S . Senator . The trade agreements were successfully concluded; the healthcare package failed.
sentences.cn: 贸易协定成功的结束了, 但是健康保险失败了.

sentences.en: The products are usually used in healthcare area and pharmaceutical area.
sentences.cn: 产品通常用于在医疗保健领域和医药领域.

sentences.en: The vaccine represents a quantum leap in healthcare.
sentences.cn: 这种疫苗的问世是医疗保健领域的重大突破。

sentences.en: There is a tight connection between healthcare buildings and people's lives.
sentences.cn: 医疗建筑与人类生活有着密切的关系.

sentences.en: They are the backbone of rural communities, and in many households they have the key responsibility for food security, education opportunities and healthcare.
sentences.cn: 她们是农村社区的支柱，而且在许多家庭，她们负有粮食安全、教育机会和医疗保健的主要责任。

sentences.en: This guidance provides general recommendations for healthcare personnel in all healthcare facilities.
sentences.cn: 这个指导对所有医疗机构的医护人员提供了综合性建议.

sentences.en: Why, with such a great healthcare system that promises the best care to everyone, would a person ever need to consult a search engine for an alternative?
sentences.cn: 这样一个伟大的医疗保健系统许诺给每个人提供最好的照料，为什么还会有人求助于搜索引擎来寻找替代品？
